<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Holy Castigation](/Feats.aspx?ID=268) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 121 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
good alignment

</column>

---

You combine holy energy with positive energy to damage demons, devils, and their evil ilk. [_Heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) spells you cast damage fiends as though they were undead.

<title level="2">Holy Castigation leads to...</title>
[Castigating Weapon](/Feats.aspx?ID=290)
name: Holy Castigation
